Articles.Content:
When I try to send a message to a user,  I get an error message that reads:

Quote

You are only allowed to send 0 messages per day. Please try again later.

How do I increase this number? I am a paying customer of KSP.

This is an anti-spam measure applied to new accounts. After you post a few more times, it will be automatically removed. 

Meanwhile, welcome to our forum.

Moved to Kerbal Network.

@Ceromancy, it's there to prevent spam bots from pestering legitimate users.  It's there for the same reason that your first 5 posts (Outside of The Lounge) must be approved by moderators before they appear.  Once you have two more approved posts, your account won't have any more restrictions.  You will be able to have a signature and profile picture at that point as well.
